attributes.action: Scrap foreign aid and use money to eradicate cancer from this world.
attributes.additional_details: Make this law foreign aid monies to be used for cancer research once all cures are found then go back to original system of foreign aid.
attributes.background: Invest foreign aid money currently allocated each year in to cancer research and find cures to this vile disease. Be world leader in research and encourage the rest of world leaders to join and fight cancer just like you have done with Covid

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Increase funding for researching and developing cancer treatments and cures
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549432
